Pre-Game Insights: India will be coming to this contest on the back of some steaming form in the shortest format of the game
India will be relying heavily upon their batting that features the hallowed likes of KL Rahul, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli
A lot will rely on the shoulders of an experienced Bhuvneshwar Kumar and a young Arshdeep Singh while only time shall reveal who should be the third pacer that Team India may opt for

Pakistan has been in the midst of a tempestuous journey of late where they drubbed New Zealand and Bangladesh in a tri-series but were also tamed by England back home and in a warm-up contest ahead of the biennial extravaganza
India vs Pakistan will take place at Melbourne Cricket Ground on 23rd October, 2022 at 1:30 PM
The head-to-head shows India with 7 wins and Pakistan with 3 wins out of 11 matches played
Miscellaneous Highlights: There is a forecast of a heavy downpour at MCG tomorrow that may significantly impact the contest and dampen the spirits of the fans and the players alike
Weather or field conditions affecting the match
